name: Mutant Frog Xtreme Part 4: The Tower Of Doom
name_original: Mutant Frog Xtreme Part 4: The Tower Of Doom
description:
Play as a mutant frog trying to rescue a princess.  The game is a bit difficult. Its a 3d platformer/bullet hell.

Created by TheOtherGuy for Ludum Dare 41
WASD/Arrows to move
Shift/Space/Q to jump
E/Enter to interact.
